The Deals Dropped Early This Year
Black Friday 2025 beauty deals are officially live — and they’re the best we’ve ever seen. Editors, influencers, and celebrities are panic-buying before sellouts.

• Dyson Airwrap Complete Long – $449 (was $599) – lowest price ever
• Shark FlexStyle System – $229 (was $349)
• NuFACE Trinity+ – $245 (was $395)
• Solawave 4-in-1 Wand – $99 (was $169)
• T3 AireBrush Duo – $129 (was $199)
• CurrentBody LED Mask – 30% off
• Dr. Dennis Gross SpectraLite FaceWare Pro – $355 (was $455)
Pro tip: Dyson and Shark are expected to sell out by Wednesday — don’t wait.
